author: Garrey Dawson
method: Heat the cocoa powder, water, milk, icing sugar and butter in a saucepan and stir until smooth and combined. In a large mixing bowl, whisk the cream until soft peaks form when the whisk is removed. Gently fold in the cocoa mixture. Serve in a wine glass, sprinkled with a dusting of cocoa powder.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz cocoa powder, plus extra to dust,  2 tbsp water,  3 tbsp whole milk,  1 tbsp icing sugar,  15g/½oz butter,  75ml/2½fl oz double cream
